attributes.action: withdraw from the european human rights act
attributes.additional_details:
i call for the uk government to repeal the european human rights act and return to the laws in force before this act was forced upon the uk.without consultation with the population.
it is an act to promote criminality and is more in favour of people who want to evade correct justice to be meted out.
victims of crime suffer because of this act,we cannot remove foreign criminals to their origin country
it is time the law supported the victims in this country and get rid of this act
